At One Nexuz, we help you pick from 3,000+ Mainland and Free Zone business activities, so you stay compliant and scale without limits. Unlock the UAE's full market potential, optimise operational efficiency, and maximise your revenue potential with confidence!

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Why is it important to choose the right business activity in the UAE?
items.answer: Selecting the right business activity ensures full compliance, avoids fines, and allows your business to operate legally. It also allows you to unlock tax advantages, nurture your professional network, and maximise your growth potential.

items.question: How long does it take to determine the correct business activity?
items.answer: Typically, choosing the right business activity can take weeks. With One Nexuz, you can shave off weeks from your setup timeline and get matched with the ideal business activity and license within hours.

items.question: How do business activities affect the type of license I need?
items.answer: Each activity is tied to a specific license type, such as commercial, professional, industrial, or service. Choosing the wrong business activity can invalidate your license, trigger fines, or even prevent you from legally conducting your business.

items.question: How many business activities can I choose without incurring extra costs during incorporation?
items.answer: Most Free Zone and Mainland business setups allow you to choose 1-3 core business activities without additional fees. Our experts help you choose the right jurisdiction and combination to boost your reach, maximise operational efficiency, and scale hassle-free.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help with business licensing and setup after picking the activity?
items.answer: Yes! Our team of seasoned business consultants offer end-to-end business setup services, including Free Zone, Mainland, or Offshore company formation, business licensing, office leasing, and PRO support- all tailored to your needs.
